## MessageBar.clear() method

Clears all non-prompt messages for the given player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clear(player: Player): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  player | [Player](./bge-core.player.md) | Player to clear messages for. |

**Returns:**

void
